Description:
Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
Mondi Štětí a.s.

Description:
Application Engineer - suitable for graduates
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our Robotics Division to expand our existing team as an Application Engineer. Your task will be to implement robotic workplace projects in various industries. Our customers are in all sectors but predominantly Automotive Tier 1. Our projects are from installation to handover and are mainly abroad, in countries like Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Russia or Israel and occasionally the Czech Republic. You can spend up to 6 months a year on these projects in total, so it's more for someone who enjoys travelling and wants to see the world. This position is suitable for experienced PLC programmers or application engineers, as well as electrical graduates who are interested in robotics and like to travel. Once you start, you don't work on projects alone, but always with more experienced colleagues to get a good grounding. For more information about our robotics division in the country, click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/products/robotics/cs Will you join us?

Description:
We’re looking for an energetic, skilled data engineer to join our team and work with us on our marketing solutions platform. You will play an important role in the development of the new ScanmarQED cloud-based data platform, develop scalable applications and work side-by-side with the team to create new solutions, test your own ideas and share your knowledge.
You will report to the Data Engineering lead, and support the team by working from our office in Prague (CZ) or our office in Houten (NL). We are looking for an individual who would describe themselves as someone who loves working with the latest technologies, is capable of abstract thinking and has good problem solving and communication skills. If you can create tools that enable the business to achieve the next growth stage and you get energized by doing this, we would like you to be part of our team!

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Description:
Hi! - We are ShipMonk, and we provide logistics services in order fulfillment. Our main business is in the USA, but our modern platform is built by Research & Development team in Prague.

Description:
Industrial Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

For our Customer Service Manufacturing Unit (CSMU) in Mosnov, we are looking for a new colleague for the position of Industrial Engineer to expand our existing team and help us optimize our unit that manufactures spare parts for the whole world. Your main responsibility will be mainly in the area of technical support for spare parts production. As part of this role, the candidate for this position should have a technical background, excellent knowledge of SAP (MM module), an understanding of manufacturing processes and excellent communication and organizational skills. Under the roof of our new Mosnov plant, we house the units of the global repair centre for industrial robots, the production plant for robotic positioning tables and application units and the unit of the global application centre . We focus on standardised solutions for the production process as well as on the individual needs of our customers. For more information about our robotics division in the country, click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/products/robotics/cs

Description:
Brno, Prague
Hello, we are Meiro
In Meiro, through our product – a Customer Data Platform (CDP) – and thanks to years of our know-how, we solve the fragmentation of customer data for companies all over the world. CDP gives access to organized, clean, and stitched customer data from multiple data sources. The strength of CDP is its ability to integrate any data source in and out of CDP. The data are collected, consolidated, cleaned and ready to be used in other systems and tools.
Our headquarters is in Singapore with part of our team. The rest of us are based between Brno and Prague. You could find our clients in Australia, Southeast Asia, Central Europe, or Scandinavia.

‍

About Workato
Workato is the only integration and automation platform that is as simple as it is powerful — and because it's built to power the largest enterprises, it is quite powerful.
Simultaneously, it's a low-code/no-code platform. This empowers any user (dev/non-dev) to painlessly automate workflows across any apps and databases.
We're proud to be named a leader by both Forrester and Gartner and trusted by 7,000+ of the world's top brands such as Box, Grab, Slack, and more. But what is most exciting is that this is only the beginning.
Why join us?

Description:
O nás
Do významné mezinárodní výrobní společnosti hledáme zkušeného kandidáta na pozici:
SENIOR QUALITY ENGINEER
Náplň práce:
nastavování a udržování kvalitativních procesů u stávajících a nových projektů
aktivně komunikovat na denní bázi se zákazníky či dodavateli
vzorkování nových či stávajících dílů

O nás
Rozšiřujeme náš stávající tým a potřebujeme možná právě Vás. Jsme významná výrobní společnost, přední dodavatel v automobilovém průmyslu. Pracujeme s nejmodernějšími technologiemi, nabízíme kromě zajímavé práce vyspělou firemní kulturu a mezinárodní přátelské prostředí.
Do závodu v TRUTNOVĚ hledáme zkušeného kandidáta /kandidátku na pozici:
TECHNOLOG /INDUSTRIAL ENGINEER
Náplň práce:

Staň se budoucností Vodafone IT!
V rámci Trainee programu Discover v oddělení IT & Digital se zapojíš do aktivit, které rozšíří Tvoje znalosti a dovednosti v IT. Staneš se součástí týmu, který dodává IT řešení pro zákazníky a zaměstnance Vodafone.
V průběhu dvouletého programu, který začíná v únoru roku 2022, proběhnou tři výcvikové bootcampy. Jsou koncipovány tak, abys postupně získal/a znalosti v oboru IT a telekomunikací. Budeme postupovat od základů až po Tebou vybranou specializaci. Ve spojení s praktickými úkoly v různých IT týmech a pod vedením mentora získáš široký přehled o tom, jak IT ve firmě jako Vodafone funguje.
Program Discover nabízí dvě základní cesty; jeden pokrývá oblasti Digital a Cloud, druhý pak Enterprise IT a základní systémy CRM, ERP, BSS a BI. Po skončení Trainee programu se dostaneš na jednu z pozic, které si můžeš prohlédnout níže. Během těchto dvou let Tě čeká zajímavý plat, bonusy a další benefity.

Description:
Prague
2.5-5 Years
Czech Republic
Job Description (Posting)
While there are enough reasons to join us, our recent #TopEmployer2023 recognition is a strong testimony of what’s in store for you when you choose to join us. Be part of a culture that always helps you shine.
When you are part of a $10 Bn company that’s been voted as the Top Employer by Forbes, you know you can take a few things granted. Like a work life balance, for example. Like having a bouquet of benefits not just for you but for your family too. Like working on some of the most rewarding projects that change our world for better. At HCL we believe, at the end of the day, who we are and how happy we are is because of the people we surround ourselves with.
HCL Technologies - HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Our technology products and services are built on four decades of innovation, with a world-renowned management philosophy, a strong culture of invention and risk-taking, and a relentless focus on customer relationships. HCL also takes pride in its many diversity, social responsibility, sustainability initiatives. Through its worldwide network of R&D facilities and co-innovation labs, global delivery capabilities, and over 159,000+ ‘Ideapreneurship’ across 50 countries, HCL delivers holistic services across industry verticals to leading enterprises, including 250 of the Fortune 500 and 650 of the Global 2000.
Role: Desktop Technician
Location: Czech Republic
Employment Type – Permanent
Position Responsibilities and Functions
Provide first/second level contact and problem resolution for customer issues.
Work with vendors to remediate complex AV issues as needed.
Provide timely communication on issue status and resolution.
Maintain ticket updates for all reported incidents.
Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot XP, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 and Microsoft Office 2010, Cisco Jabber, another authorized desktop application.
Should have basic knowledge of Mac operating system, to support Apple pc users.
Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot for printers, computer hardware.
Performs general preventative maintenance tasks on computers, laptops, printers.
Performs remedial repairs on Desktops, laptops, printers and any other authorized peripheral equipment.
Use diagnostic tools to troubleshoot problems associated with network connectivity, and workstation hardware/software.
Broad experience of IT with basic understanding of Networks, Servers, Audio/Visual, Smart Devices and Telecoms.
This position requires the ability to work in a project-based environment requiring flexibility and teamwork. Performs other duties as assigned.
Candidate Required Minimum Qualifications and Skills
Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field.
CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP) or better.
Minimum of 18 months of IT experience.
Windows 7-10, Microsoft Active Directory, utilization of GPOs, MS Office 365, PC hardware installation and troubleshooting, Enterprise anti-virus solutions, Helpdesk ticketing systems.
Mobile device management including IOS and Android devices, Enterprise encryption solution

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Cloud Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics:
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Technology teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Cloud Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Description:
About Us:
SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. Singularity XDR ingests data and leverages our patented AI models to deliver autonomous protection. With SentinelOne, organizations gain full transparency into everything happening across the network at machine speed – to defeat every attack, at every stage of the threat lifecycle.
We are a values-driven team where names are known, results are rewarded, and friendships are formed. Trust, accountability, relentlessness, ingenuity, and OneSentinel define the pillars of our collaborative and unified global culture. We're looking for people that will drive team success and collaboration across SentinelOne. If you're enthusiastic about innovative approaches to problem-solving, we would love to speak with you about joining our team!

Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
The Mastercard Launch program is aimed at early career talent, to help you develop skills and gain cross-functional work experience. Over a period of 18 months, Launch participants will be assigned to a business unit, learn and develop skills, and gain valuable on the job experience.

Be part of the Data & Services Technology Team at Mastercard, Data and Services

Data Engineers are fundamental to the success of our client engagements by acting as the bridge between raw client data and Mastercard's software. Data Engineers work closely with both Consultants while working on consulting engagements and Software Development Engineers while working to develop internal capabilities. Description:
Do našeho přátelského týmu pro divizi TRADING v Praze hledáme nového kolegu/ kolegyni na pozici:
Data Engineer/Scientist
Co má na starosti náš Research & Development tým:
V rámci divize TRADING je naším úkolem rozvoj algoritmického obchodování. Působíme na komoditních trzích, kde těžíme z podpory našeho ostříleného tradingového týmu. Podařilo se nám úspěšně implementovat několik zajímavých strategií na spotových trzích s elektřinou, nyní se posouváme na forwardové trhy a potřebujeme posílit analytický tým. Vše běží na interní k8s platformě. Naše práce je o analýze časových řad a následném prototypování, proto jednoznačně preferujeme Python

Description:

Description:
At our Siemens Advanta R&D Center we are focused on a product development including software development, hardware development, mechanical design and testing for the next generation concept of Industry 4.0.
Project information:
We would like to invite you to cooperate on the development of synchronous electromotors for commercial vehicles (buses, trucks, mining vehicles, …). We focus on complete product development with emphasis on creation of 3D, 2D data and simulations of single parts of motor (rotor, stator, shaft, housing, …) to complete and complex assemblies and their integration across the entire product lifetime from sample phase till series production.
For our mechanical team in Prague, we are looking for a reliable and independent mechanical design engineer with a degree in mechanical engineering with experience also with simulation. He must have knowledge of materials and manufacturing processes (casting, molding, machining, sheet metal forming, welding)- mandatory knowledge due to mechanical changes (3D/2D) and material selection for different parts and assemblies during whole product lifetime. Very good knowledge of languages (English B2 / C1) and knowledge of PLM program- Teamcenter and CAD program- NX. Requirements are also skills and communication experience with suppliers, customers, and other internal departments (production plants in China, development departments in Germany and USA, project management, logistic, purchasing, quality, type test, software, hardware) on daily basis.

Description:
Desktop Technician bude poskytovat každodenní podporu místní/vzdálené plochy, přijímat příchozí hovory, odpovídat na otázky, odstraňovat problémy a dokumentovat kroky provedené k vyřešení problémů s hardwarem, softwarem a aplikacemi v systému prodeje vstupenek. Kandidát bude také muset usnadnit řešení hovorů zákazníkům a zapojit jejich nadřízené a manažery, aby zajistili provozní konzistentnost ve všech směnách v rámci centra podpory IT. Desktop Support Engineer poskytuje opravu Break Fix, diagnostiku chyb a řešení. Poskytování analýzy chyb různým základním operačním systémům a platformám zákazníka a také schopnost poskytovat podporu a používat řešení chyb desktopů pro schválenou sadu aplikací. Ideální kandidát by měl mít 1-2 roky zkušeností s podporou Windows Desktop.
Pozice Odpovědnosti a funkce
a) Poskytněte kontakt první/druhé úrovně a řešení problémů se zákazníky.

Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Data Engineer II
Mastercard Overview

Mastercard is the global technology company behind the world’s fastest payments processing network. We are a vehicle for commerce, a connection to financial systems for the previously excluded, a technology innovation lab, and the home of Priceless®. We ensure every employee can be a part of something bigger and change lives. We believe as our company grows, so should you. We believe in connecting everyone to endless, priceless possibilities.

Join a fast-growing team

As a Data Engineer, you will develop data & analytics solutions that sit atop vast datasets gathered by retail stores, restaurants, banks, and other consumer-focused companies. The challenge will be to create high-performance algorithms, cutting-edge analytical techniques including machine learning and artificial intelligence, and intuitive workflows that allow our users to derive insights from big data that in turn drive their businesses. You will have the opportunity to create high-performance analytic solutions based on data sets measured in the billions of transactions and front-end visualizations to unleash the value of big data.
You will have the opportunity to develop data-driven innovative analytical solutions and identify opportunities to support business and client needs in a quantitative manner and facilitate informed recommendations/decisions through activities like building ML models, automated data pipelines, designing data architecture/schema, performing jobs in big data cluster by using different execution engines and program languages such as Hive/Impala, Python, Spark, R, etc.
Your Role

Ideal Candidate Qualifications:

The following skills will be considered as a plus

Description:
The Opportunity
QuidelOrtho unites the strengths of Quidel Corporation and Ortho Clinical Diagnostics, creating a world-leading in vitro diagnostics company with award-winning expertise in immunoassay and molecular testing, clinical chemistry and transfusion medicine. We are more than 6,000 strong and do business in over 130 countries, providing answers with fast, accurate and consistent testing where and when they are needed most – home to hospital, lab to clinic.
Our culture puts our team members first and prioritizes actions that support happiness, inspiration and engagement. We strive to build meaningful connections with each other as we believe that employee happiness and business success are linked. Join us in our mission to transform the power of diagnostics into a healthier future for all.

Description:
Come and be a part of the future...
As a member of the Vodafone Trainee program in IT and Digital you will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Software Engineering teams.
Over the course of the two-year program, starting in February 2022 you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have positions open for several roles; you can find more about each one in the Future Positions section. And you will receive a generous allowance during the two years.

Description:
About Us:
SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. Singularity XDR ingests data and leverages our patented AI models to deliver autonomous protection. With SentinelOne, organizations gain full transparency into everything happening across the network at machine speed – to defeat every attack, at every stage of the threat lifecycle.
We are a values-driven team where names are known, results are rewarded, and friendships are formed. Trust, accountability, relentlessness, ingenuity, and OneSentinel define the pillars of our collaborative and unified global culture. We're looking for people that will drive team success and collaboration across SentinelOne. If you're enthusiastic about innovative approaches to problem-solving, we would love to speak with you about joining our team!

Job_title: Software Engineer - Secure Network Analytics & XDR
Description:
Software Engineer - Secure Network Analytics & XDR Prague, CZ
What You'll Do
You will build a security detection system for our customers using current technologies.
You will make technology choices and put them into practice. Technologies like React, Node.js, HTML 5, Gherkin on the front end and Java, Scala, Go, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS on the back end would be good starting points.
You will work with your team to deliver innovative security software solutions (not writing shelfware) for our customers.
You will be part of a strong collaborative Agile/Scrum team. Individuality in a team environment reflects the culture you will need to support.

Description:
Do našeho přátelského týmu pro divizi TRADING v Praze hledáme nového kolegu/ kolegyni na pozici:
Data Engineer/Scientist
Co má na starosti náš Research & Development tým:
V rámci divize TRADING je naším úkolem rozvoj algoritmického obchodování. Působíme na komoditních trzích, kde těžíme z podpory našeho ostříleného tradingového týmu. Podařilo se nám úspěšně implementovat několik zajímavých strategií na spotových trzích s elektřinou, nyní se posouváme na forwardové trhy a potřebujeme posílit analytický tým. Vše běží na interní k8s platformě. Naše práce je o analýze časových řad a následném prototypování, proto jednoznačně preferujeme Python

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Oracle Applications Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Software Engineering teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Oracle Applications Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Job_title: Data Engineer / Analyst Senior - migrace do cloudu
Description:
U našeho klienta pracujeme na kompletně novém datovém řešení pro potřeby reportingu v různých business entitách; analýza dostupných zdrojů, návrh modelu, koncept data mesh, technologie db Snowlake, AWS, zvažuje se nějaký nástroj pro automatizaci (např. WhereScape), Data Governace.
Pacujeme na migraci z platformy Informatica PowerCenter na platformu Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services (IICS). Týmy, které na tomto velkém projektu pracují, jsou v Americe, Evropě i Asii. Tvým úkolem by bylo připravit dopadovou analýzu a navrhnout harmonogram realizace.

Description:
Internship/SW Developer - part time-230000XP

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Internship - Software Engineer - Platform

Part time paid job for students with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Description:
Prague
2.5-5 Years
Czech Republic
Job Description (Posting)
While there are enough reasons to join us, our recent #TopEmployer2023 recognition is a strong testimony of what’s in store for you when you choose to join us. Be part of a culture that always helps you shine.
When you are part of a $10 Bn company that’s been voted as the Top Employer by Forbes, you know you can take a few things granted. Like a work life balance, for example. Like having a bouquet of benefits not just for you but for your family too. Like working on some of the most rewarding projects that change our world for better. At HCL we believe, at the end of the day, who we are and how happy we are is because of the people we surround ourselves with.
HCL Technologies - HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Our technology products and services are built on four decades of innovation, with a world-renowned management philosophy, a strong culture of invention and risk-taking, and a relentless focus on customer relationships. HCL also takes pride in its many diversity, social responsibility, sustainability initiatives. Through its worldwide network of R&D facilities and co-innovation labs, global delivery capabilities, and over 159,000+ ‘Ideapreneurship’ across 50 countries, HCL delivers holistic services across industry verticals to leading enterprises, including 250 of the Fortune 500 and 650 of the Global 2000.
Role: Desktop Technician
Location: Czech Republic
Employment Type – Permanent
Position Responsibilities and Functions
Provide first/second level contact and problem resolution for customer issues.
Work with vendors to remediate complex AV issues as needed.
Provide timely communication on issue status and resolution.
Maintain ticket updates for all reported incidents.
Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot XP, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 and Microsoft Office 2010, Cisco Jabber, another authorized desktop application.
Should have basic knowledge of Mac operating system, to support Apple pc users.
Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot for printers, computer hardware.
Performs general preventative maintenance tasks on computers, laptops, printers.
Performs remedial repairs on Desktops, laptops, printers and any other authorized peripheral equipment.
Use diagnostic tools to troubleshoot problems associated with network connectivity, and workstation hardware/software.
Broad experience of IT with basic understanding of Networks, Servers, Audio/Visual, Smart Devices and Telecoms.
This position requires the ability to work in a project-based environment requiring flexibility and teamwork. Performs other duties as assigned.
Candidate Required Minimum Qualifications and Skills
Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field.
CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP) or better.
Minimum of 18 months of IT experience.
Windows 7-10, Microsoft Active Directory, utilization of GPOs, MS Office 365, PC hardware installation and troubleshooting, Enterprise anti-virus solutions, Helpdesk ticketing systems.
Mobile device management including IOS and Android devices, Enterprise encryption solution

Description:
Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to work on Veeam products with Veeam QA professionals in the Prague R&D office.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”
Veeam builds products to meet complex backup and data management challenges. We work with VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V and Nutanix AHV virtualization; Windows, Linux and Unix physical systems; Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, SQL, Oracle and SAP HANA servers; Amazon, Azure and Google Cloud public clouds; and many other technologies that form the core of modern IT.

Description:
Valeo is a tech global company, designing breakthrough solutions to reinvent the mobility. We are an automotive supplier partner to automakers and new mobility actors worldwide. Our vision? Invent a greener and more secured mobility, thanks to solutions focusing on intuitive driving and reducing CO2 emissions. We are leader on our businesses, and recognized as one of the largest global innovative companies.
We are an automotive supplier, a partner to all automakers worldwide. As a technological company, we design innovative products and systems that contribute to reduction of CO2 emissions and to development of automated driving. In our Research and Development center in Prague we employ seven hundred engineers. They are those who stand behind the latest systems of active safety (ADAS) and autonomous driving. What does it mean? Software, hardware engineers, together with mechanical designers, test and system engineers develop sensors and systems for safe and comfortable driving. Automated parking systems, automated emergency braking, blind spot detection and road sign recognition are just a few examples.

SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. Welcome to Monstarlab Engineering
We are Monstarlab - a digital consultancy with engineering at the core ‍ We care a lot about delivering value to our clients and we strive to hit the sweet spot between moving fast and being a strategic partner ❤️

Description:
Náš tým tvoří na třicet vývojářů, datových inženýrů a datových vědců, kteří mají za sebou více jak desítku platforem Big Data postavených on premise a aktuálně se podílejí na přesunu analytických platforem do cloudu. Naše inovační projekty čítají více než 50 aplikačních a analytických řešení v oblasti Big Data a Data Science. Chceš pracovat na těch dalších? Čti dál!
Co budeš mít na starosti:
Návrh a implementaci end-to-end datových řešení na míru pro klienta včetně datové kvality, návrhu datových modelů, automatizace procesů a dalších aspektů.
Úzce spolupracovat s klientem na přípravě datové vrstvy nebo data martu.
Práci s nejmodernějšími technologiemi - např. Spark, Impala, Kafka, Cassandra a další NoSql databáze, Airflow, frameworky pro machine learning a AI, nejnovější knihovny ve Scale a Pythonu.

Description:
We are currently looking for a Junior Manual Test Engineer for our very first location, where everything started - Prague!!
Does finding bugs infuse your brain with dopamine? Good. With 8 million lines of code, you'll have plenty of room to play with.
We are looking for a Junior Manual Test Engineer, passionate about software quality and testing. You will work closely with our Software Engineers to ensure that the currently developed features are verified and pass the quality gate.
About your Team:
The Engineering Team is the largest of all our teams with around 70+ colleagues. We have more than 10 teams working on 8 million lines of code split into 1000 modules and delivering over 1000 new features per year. Although MANTA is a creature of the ocean, making cloud its habitat is one of our goals for this year, so our team is growing and we are looking for people that want to help in this big challenge, which is making our product flawless. Whether you are intrigued by testing rich user interfaces of web applications or you enjoy exploring what happens under the hood of a complex system, you'll find a place at MANTA. Feels like a challenge? Good. Send us your application and take a dive with us!

Description:
As a data engineer in Databreakers you will be developing intelligence of our products. Your algorithms will improve automatic decision making process based on data better than any human ever could. We are improving the world of online content for millions of users via web/email/app environment personalization. Instead of same page for everyone content is tailored precisely for every single user, so millions of different pages and marketing campaigns can automatically transform according to user’s preferences leaving annoying adds behind and become a useful & effective service.
You will be designing data driven solutions for our customers like Makro / Alza / Mall / Škoda Auto / PPF / O2 and you’ll be creating general algorithms for our own products using data of our partners as Facebook or Google.
Everything you’ll be doing while working with us will immediately influence millions users and we can easily test our models performance real-time through AB tests with just one click.
APPLY NOW

Hi! - We are ShipMonk, and we provide logistics services in order fulfillment. Our main business is in the USA, but our modern platform is built by Research & Development team in Prague.

Here at ShipMonk, we process up to 100,000 orders per day in our peak season. Our book of business has more than 1,500 clients which are small and medium e-shops, mostly based in the US. We offer the ShipMonk platform as the solution for the whole process. It covers everything from stocking the items to shipping the ready packages to all corners of the world!

We are looking for a Senior QA Engineer in our 5-member QA team. This person will enjoy breaking applications while improving them. This will be a manual role working hand-in-hand with our technical team.

Description:
Do Prahy nebo Českých Budějovic hledáme kolegu/kolegyni pro pomoc se správou informačních a operačních systémů, cloudu a našich aplikací.
Systémy běží v Javě, PHP či Node.js, provozujeme je v cloudu (AWS) a máme rádi Docker, Continuous Integration a vůbec věci, které zjednodušují život.
Fandíme open source a spolupracujeme i s univerzitami. Studujícím kolegům můžeme vést absolventské práce
Co bys s námi dělal/a
řešil/a provozní problémy (práce s daty v databázích, analýza logů a rychlé drobné opravy)
spravoval/a prostředí (nasazování nových verzí, údržba systémů a aplikací, monitoring produkčního prostředí)

Do našeho Data Engineering týmu hledáme nového kolegu, který nám pomůže vítězit nad datovými problémy zákazníků (práce v týmu Praha/Brno/remote).

Data Engineer / IT konzultant
Tvojí prací bude analýza, návrh a implementace zákaznických projektů v oblasti integrace dat, a to s použitím software nástrojů CloverDX. Častý přímý kontakt se zahraničními zákazníky vyžaduje dobré komunikační dovednosti. Našimi zákazníky jsou nadnárodní firmy i nadějné startupy z oblasti financí/FinTech, zdravotnictví, retailu, consultingu, či logistiky (VISA, Tesla, Moody’s, HSBC, Accenture, FedEx, …)

Description:
Microsoft Development Center in Prague has got multiple positions open for Software Engineers to be hired across different teams.

The hiring groups are:

Identity Platform/Microsoft Entra - sits within our Security, Compliance, Identity and Management Division and is at the heart of the day-to-day technology experience for billions of humans globally, playing a critical part in enabling everyone to achieve more. Our suite of products powers everything from Windows to Office, Azure to Xbox. Microsoft Entra is a dynamic and inclusive team which cares deeply about our customer experience and works to solve extraordinarily complex problems at extreme scale.

Microsoft Identity and Network Access – IDNA Security Engineering team. Authentication Method Runtime team, of which you would be a part, is charged with delivering modern, secure, and delightful authentication experiences for customers, enabling the right methods for the right occasion. Authentication service, where you will work, serves > 100B requests per day touching over 1B humans globally.

Description:
Valeo is a tech global company, designing breakthrough solutions to reinvent the mobility. We are an automotive supplier partner to automakers and new mobility actors worldwide. Our vision? Invent a greener and more secured mobility, thanks to solutions focusing on intuitive driving and reducing CO2 emissions. We are leader on our businesses, and recognized as one of the largest global innovative companies.
We are an automotive supplier, a partner to all automakers worldwide. As a technological company, we design innovative products and systems that contribute to reduction of CO2 emissions and to development of automated driving. In our Research and Development center in Prague we employ seven hundred engineers. They are those who stand behind the latest systems of active safety (ADAS) and autonomous driving. What does it mean? Software, hardware engineers, together with mechanical designers, test and system engineers develop sensors and systems for safe and comfortable driving. Automated parking systems, automated emergency braking, blind spot detection and road sign recognition are just a few examples.

Description:
Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to work on Veeam products with Veeam QA professionals in the Prague R&D office.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”
Veeam builds products to meet complex backup and data management challenges. We work with VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V and Nutanix AHV virtualization; Windows, Linux and Unix physical systems; Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, SQL, Oracle and SAP HANA servers; Amazon, Azure and Google Cloud public clouds; and many other technologies that form the core of modern IT.

Description:
We are currently looking for a Junior Manual Test Engineer for our very first location, where everything started - Prague!!
Does finding bugs infuse your brain with dopamine? Good. With 8 million lines of code, you'll have plenty of room to play with.
We are looking for a Junior Manual Test Engineer, passionate about software quality and testing. You will work closely with our Software Engineers to ensure that the currently developed features are verified and pass the quality gate.
About your Team:
The Engineering Team is the largest of all our teams with around 70+ colleagues. We have more than 10 teams working on 8 million lines of code split into 1000 modules and delivering over 1000 new features per year. Although MANTA is a creature of the ocean, making cloud its habitat is one of our goals for this year, so our team is growing and we are looking for people that want to help in this big challenge, which is making our product flawless. Whether you are intrigued by testing rich user interfaces of web applications or you enjoy exploring what happens under the hood of a complex system, you'll find a place at MANTA. Feels like a challenge? Good. Send us your application and take a dive with us!

Description:
As a data engineer in Databreakers you will be developing intelligence of our products. Your algorithms will improve automatic decision making process based on data better than any human ever could. We are improving the world of online content for millions of users via web/email/app environment personalization. Instead of same page for everyone content is tailored precisely for every single user, so millions of different pages and marketing campaigns can automatically transform according to user’s preferences leaving annoying adds behind and become a useful & effective service.
You will be designing data driven solutions for our customers like Makro / Alza / Mall / Škoda Auto / PPF / O2 and you’ll be creating general algorithms for our own products using data of our partners as Facebook or Google.
Everything you’ll be doing while working with us will immediately influence millions users and we can easily test our models performance real-time through AB tests with just one click.
APPLY NOW

From kernel to cloud, we provide high-impact software development services to Fortune 500 companies. We are seeking an exceptionally talented Lead Machine Learning Engineer to join our rapidly growing consulting team. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on high-profile projects at the cutting edge of the software industry and help build our internal Machine Learning practice.

To be considered for this position, you must have the following qualifications:
Masters or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or a related field.

Description:
Job Description & Summary
O týmu
Propojujeme svět podnikání s technologiemi od designu až po implementaci. V Technology Consulting jste nejen součástí PwC, ale získáte možnost poznat, jak to funguje i v jiných společnostech. Job_title: Technical Account Manager (TAM) Cloud/Networking/K8s - Opportunity for Working Remotely Prague,
Description:
Why will you enjoy this new opportunity?
Does helping organizations achieve their business goals through the usage of technology inspire you? If it does, we have the perfect job opportunity for you!
As a Technical Account Manager (TAM), you will have the pleasure of using both your technical and your communication and collaboration skills to help our customers achieve their full potential through the adoption of VMware's technology.
Upon joining our Customer Success Technical Account Management team, you will have the opportunity to bring your authentic self to work and use your skills to make an impact and drive change for our customers, products, and company.
In the TAM role, no day is the same, and you will never be bored! You will interact daily with your assigned customers and will be able to make a real impact on their success as a business. TAMs find nothing more satisfying than being challenged and being able to turn challenges into positive outcomes. You will be able to manage your schedule and priorities to help our customers achieve their goals and, at the same time, maintain an outstanding work/life balance. As a TAM, you will have the opportunity to specialize in a given VMware solution area by developing & maintaining deep technical knowledge & skills for related VMware products. You will also be able to create a long-term relationship with your assigned customers while developing an understanding of the customer’s technical goals as they align to their business goals and the overall impact of VMware’s solutions on business results.






VMware Company Overview: At VMware, we believe that software has the power to unlock new opportunities for people and our planet. We look beyond the barriers of compromise to engineer new ways to make technologies work together seamlessly. Our cloud, mobility, and security software form a flexible, consistent digital foundation for securely delivering the apps, services and experiences that are transforming business innovation around the globe. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution, passion, integrity, customers, and community. Shape what’s possible today at http://careers.vmware.com.

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement: VMware is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any Kind: VMware is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at VMware are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. VMware will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. VMware encourages applicants of all ages. Vmware will provide reasonable accommodation to employees who have protected disabilities consistent with local law.

Description:
Microsoft Development Center in Prague has got multiple positions open for Senior Software Engineers to be hired across different teams.

The hiring groups are:

Identity Platform/Microsoft Entra - sits within our Security, Compliance, Identity and Management Division and is at the heart of the day-to-day technology experience for billions of humans globally, playing a critical part in enabling everyone to achieve more. Our suite of products powers everything from Windows to Office, Azure to Xbox. Microsoft Entra is a dynamic and inclusive team which cares deeply about our customer experience and works to solve extraordinarily complex problems at extreme scale.

Microsoft Identity and Network Access – IDNA Security Engineering team. Authentication Method Runtime team, of which you would be a part, is charged with delivering modern, secure, and delightful authentication experiences for customers, enabling the right methods for the right occasion. Authentication service, where you will work, serves > 100B requests per day touching over 1B humans globally.

Description:
Our Application Software Engineers are finding new and creative ways of making vehicles more efficient every day. Join us and set the industry towards a cleaner future!
Part of the Garrett Engineering organization, the Electrification Centre of Excellence team is responsible for developing a differentiated product portfolio of e-boosting solutions that enables our customers to set new benchmarks in vehicle efficiency.
From Garrett’s Two-Stage Hydrogen Fuel Cell Compressor launched back in 2016 to the Electric Turbo expected on the road as early as 2021, our Electrification Centre of Excellence teams have been setting the stage for new exciting products. Integrating state-of-the art ultra-high-speed electric motor/generators, power electronics, control electronics, and advance control software, our Engineers are leading innovations for a safer, cleaner and more efficient world on the move.

Description:
The team works with the product development team to deliver solutions to Global clients.
We are looking for a talented and motivated QA engineer with web testing experience to join our development team. The team are responsible for a variety of software products, ranging from industry-leading regulatory products to new greenfield developments. We have a vacancy for someone to join the team as we continue to build out our product suite into the cloud and beyond.
You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of products. Working in an agile environment as part of a cross-functional team comprising software and financial engineers, software QAs, DevOps, and product specialists, you will help ensure we deliver the best software solutions to our clients.
You will work closely with product managers and business analysts to drive out requirements, and have a good working knowledge of the full software testing life cycle, taking ownership of work from specification through implementation and test to delivery. As part of the software engineering team you will help ensure we continuously refine and improve our processes, following industry best practices and having plenty of opportunities for learning and personal development.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
Testing bereme jako důležitou součástí vývoje produktu. Vývojáři a testeři jsou u nás parťáci, kteří společně pracují na tom, aby dodaná práce byla kvalitní a splňovala přání zákazníka.

Každý tester se věnuje své oblasti, aby ji poznal do hloubky a jeho práce byla díky tomu kvalitnější:
E-shop pilulka.cz/sk/ro/hu – rozvíjíme naše vlastní in-house řešení. Měsíčně jej navštěvují milióny zákazníků, letos jsme nově spustili i Maďarsko (plánujeme Rakousko a Německo)
Mobilní aplikace – naše věrné zákazníky hýčkáme v mobilní aplikaci, kde jsme třeba jako první v ČR spustili platby přes Apple Pay, sledování kurýrů nebo věrnostní program Pilulka Fit využívající data ze smart devices. Naše aplikace patří k nejlépe hodnoceným a nejpoužívanějším v daném segmentu (průměr 4,8 a 15000+ hodnocení)

Description:
Join us on our journey in building a web scraping and automation platform to help the world’s biggest companies and upcoming startups leverage the web's full potential. Each month, we save people tons of hours of manual work by turning more than a billion web pages into data and automating over 15 million tasks on the web
Apify has grown as the tool of choice for any Node.js engineer when it comes to web scraping and web automation. Now we are on a journey to conquer the world of Python, and we need you! A Python engineer with a passion for open-source development (see our GitHub and Python SDK), working with the community (visit our Discord), who will help us to make Apify also the #1 choice in the Python community.
You will be part of one of our 5 product teams—the team that works on Apify’s open-source tooling loved by the community. The team is led by Martin Adamek, co-author of Apify’s Crawlee and his own MikroORM framework. You will face many challenges regarding the usage of browsers in the cloud, browser fingerprinting, scalability, and others. You will be in direct touch with the community that uses the tools you build.

Description:
Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to participate in internal development in several European R&D offices.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”
Veeam builds products to meet complex backup and data management challenges. We work with VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V and Nutanix AHV virtualization; Windows, Linux and Unix physical systems; Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, SQL, Oracle and SAP HANA servers; Amazon, Azure and Google Cloud public clouds; and many other technologies that form the core of modern IT.

Description:
Zeta is looking for backend engineers with great talent and potential to join us! We are seeking experienced, energetic, and self-starting technologists to join the Data Cloud team. Our Data Cloud team is responsible for the Zeta Identity Graph platform, which captures billions of behavioral, demographic, environmental, and transactional signals, for people-based marketing.

As part of this team, the backend engineer will be designing and growing our existing audience generation platform, implementing the product features, code and unit test product features, review product documentation, support quality assurance team, support proof of concept activities, diagnose and fix product problems/bugs.

Responsibilites:
As a Senior Backend Engineer, your responsibilities will include:

:
We are looking for exceptional talent with superior academic credentials and a solid foundation in computer sciences and distributed systems design and development.

The candidate will have had at least 5 years of experience developing scalable, robust software platforms using Python/Ruby/Java or an equivalent language. An undergraduate degree in Computer Science (or a related field) from a university where the primary language of instruction is English is strongly desired. Strong communication skills in a large distributed development team environment are essential.

:
experience)
scaling a highly-trafficked website or web application

Description:
Valeo is a tech global company, designing breakthrough solutions to reinvent the mobility. We are an automotive supplier partner to automakers and new mobility actors worldwide. Our vision? Invent a greener and more secured mobility, thanks to solutions focusing on intuitive driving and reducing CO2 emissions. We are leader on our businesses, and recognized as one of the largest global innovative companies.
Chtěl/a by sis vyzkoušet testování systémů pro autonomní auta? Zajímá tě robotika a chceš se dozvědět víc o tom, jak fungují a komunikují systémy v autě mezi sebou? Rád/a si sedneš za volant, abys zjistil/a, jak správně otestovat systém v autě, který veřejnost uvidí až za 2-3 roky?
Do našeho Radarového týmu hledáme kolegu/kolegyni se zapálením pro nové technologie, který/která se bude podílet na testování a to od nastavení konceptu validace systému přes vývoj potřebných nástrojů až po měření a reportování výsledných parametrů systému s kladením důrazu na automatizaci.
Naše oddělení vyvíjí různé typy senzorů na bázi radaru pro systémy aktivní bezpečnosti v automobilovém průmyslu. Pražský tým obsahuje všechny důležité role potřebné pro vývoj produktu, tedy od definice systémových požadavků a vývoje algoritmů funkcí přes design HW a implementaci SW až po systémovou a produktovou validaci. Podílíme na vývoji platformních projektů, ale i projektů pro automobilky po celém světě. Součástí naší práce je i kooperace s ostatními produktovými linkami Valeo, protože výstupy našich senzorů jsou sloučeny do jednoho celku, nad kterými Valeo vytváří pokročilé ADAS funkce.
R&D Engineer
Engineering System CDA
Full time
Regular

Description:
Supplier Quality Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to the ABB Operations Centre Europe in Ostrava for the position of "Supplier Quality Engineer. " In this position you will be responsible for supplier quality and conducting supplier audits for our suppliers in the energy industry. In this role, you will use English language on a daily basis both when communicating with colleagues and also with suppliers during visits. You will conduct some supplier visits in person and some remotely. All of our suppliers are within Europe. ABB's Europe Operations Centre in Ostrava is part of ABB's Process Automation division, which carries out engineering for units across Europe and employs more than 600 people. It also includes a supply chain management centre. For more information, visit https://new.abb.com/cz/o-nas/technologie-inovace/operacni-centrum-evropa This is a Supplier Quality Engineer, reporting to the Team Leader.

Jsme prednim dodavatelem vysokovykonovych polovodicu s vyrobnimi zavody a vyzkumnou laboratori ve Svycarsku a v Praze. Description:
Valeo is a tech global company, designing breakthrough solutions to reinvent the mobility. We are an automotive supplier partner to automakers and new mobility actors worldwide. Our vision? Invent a greener and more secured mobility, thanks to solutions focusing on intuitive driving and reducing CO2 emissions. We are leader on our businesses, and recognized as one of the largest global innovative companies.
We are an automotive supplier, partner to all automakers worldwide. As a technology company, Valeo proposes innovative products and systems that contribute to the reduction of CO2 emissions and to the development of intuitive driving. Since 2013 we are developing in our Prague R&D Center advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) for smarter cars. Valeo is a leading supplier of components and systems for the world's automakers. In our R&D (Research & Development) Center in Prague we develop Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) for intelligent cars.
The Systems and Functions Department is working on the development of new user and safety functions. They are also able to combine inputs from several sensors, so-called “sensor fusion”. Each sensor technology has its advantages and limits. With increasing car autonomy it is therefore necessary to fuse several types of sensors to achieve robustness and redundancy. Thanks to the sensor fusion the car always has a reliable data map of its surroundings.
R&D Engineer
Engineering System Team CDA
Full time
Regular
Main Employment (standard value)
2023-03-14

Description:
This is an exciting opportunity for a software engineer passionate about open source software, Linux, and building technology for democratization of Data Centers. Help us build the #1 bare metal cloud system, and work with the best and brightest people in technology at Canonical!
The Ubuntu MAAS team is responsible for delivering our Metal As A Service hyperscale provisioning technology. Ubuntu strives to be the most scalable, cloud ready server distribution and MAAS is our platform to get it there. MAAS is a rapidly evolving software stack written in Python and Go, and we are looking for experienced software engineers who understand performance at scale, networking, storage and usability.
Applicants should be passionate about the future of Ubuntu and be able to show technical leadership with a globally distributed team of engineers who share that passion. This position requires international travel several times a year.

Description:
We are looking for an ambitious Software Data Platform Engineer on the NN International catapult team, you will play a key role in supporting the company's goal to become a data-driven organization. The catapult team supports the NN data platform program by assisting in the deployment and expansion of the new standard NN data platforms across Europe and in the migration and decommissioning of the legacy data initiatives. This will involve providing local and remote hands-on support to country data teams, collaborating with the NNDAP product team, and developing components on top of the NNDAP platform. You will be a critical member of the team responsible for ensuring the success of the NN data platform program. The catapult team is located in Prague close to the Data Science team and Data Modelling team. The NNDAP product team is located in the Netherlands

Job_title: QA Engineer for a cybersecurity product
Description:
We protect data while respecting the work of users so that you do not complicate their work and they are safe. Become a part of our extraordinary quest for a safer world!

We're looking for a junior QA Engineer to join our new Classification team led by Jakub Neruda. We need someone to help us improve our DLP by enabling full cross-endpoint security.
In doing so, you could be working with C# and Azure DevOps, optimizing and improving our testing process to make it as smooth and reliable as possible, or bringing a fresh perspective on the software development process as a whole.
We work in an agile environment, and our team consists of a team leader, scrum master, developers, and us, QA engineers, who cover their backs. In full cooperation, we enjoy the challenge of constant improvement, and we learn from each other.

As part of this team, the backend engineer will be designing and growing our existing audience generation platform, implementing the product features, code and unit test product features, review product documentation, support quality assurance team, support proof of concept activities, diagnose and fix product problems/bugs.

Responsibilites:

:
We are looking for exceptional talent with superior academic credentials and a solid foundation in computer sciences and distributed systems design and development.

An undergraduate degree in Computer Science (or a related field) from a university where the primary language of instruction is English is strongly desired. Description:
Automation Engineer for Marine & Ports
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a candidate for the position of Automation Engineer for the Marine & Ports department in the European Operations Centre in Ostrava. We offer you the opportunity to get involved in prestigious international projects in the field of maritime transport in cooperation with project teams in Finland, Norway, USA and other countries. You will be involved in automation solutions for large ocean-going ships as well as automation of advanced hybrid propulsion technologies in the dynamically growing Short Distance Shipping segment. Your tasks will include implementation of designed solutions and bringing them to life with end customers in attractive destinations. Be part of a team whose standard is a friendly working atmosphere, trust and mutual support. This is an Automation Engineer for Marine & Ports, reporting to the Team Leader.

Job_title: Golang System Software Engineer - Containers / Virtualisation
Description:
We are hiring a Golang software engineer to work on the low level Go codebase sitting between our REST API and the low level C libraries used to manage containers and virtual machines. We are looking for system-level developers with experience in design and data management/modeling.
The LXD team is responsible for the design, development and evolution of LXD, a modern system container and virtual machine manager that is widely used on Ubuntu, ChromeOS and other Linux platforms. LXD components span the entire software stack from low-level kernel features to the upper level management REST API and CLI.
This is an opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern cloud computing technologies. Canonical offers a fun, fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Description:
Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to participate in internal development in several European R&D offices.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”
Veeam builds products to meet complex backup and data management challenges. We work with VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V and Nutanix AHV virtualization; Windows, Linux and Unix physical systems; Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, SQL, Oracle and SAP HANA servers; Amazon, Azure and Google Cloud public clouds; and many other technologies that form the core of modern IT.

Description:
Degree from an accredited institution,
Highly proficient in both spoken and written English & Czechk (Common European Framework of Reference C1)
Experience from Industrial Engineering, Business Process Engineering, Quality, Operations or Logistics
Project Portfolio Management experience

We are Amazon; we pioneer.

Since opening our virtual doors 1995, we’ve been pushing the boundaries of possible further and further.

Our entire business works hard to delight our customers – from the second an order is placed online to the seamless coordination of that order behind the scenes, we strive to stay agile, fluid and intentional. That can be described in one of our core Leadership Principles, which is Bias for Action. This means that our teams band together, roll up their sleeves, and aren’t content with standing still.

Amazon’s overall mission is simple: to be the place where customers can find, discover and buy anything online. Whatever customers want, Amazon will find the means to deliver it. With your help, Amazon will continue to enable people to discover new worlds and implement innovation. This is your chance to make history.

The Role

The Continuous Improvements Manager supports, coordinates and facilitates implementation of new and improved structures, processes and activities. Working closely with EU teams and all levels of management within the Fulfillment Center (FC), you report directly to the Regional Continuous Improvement Manager.

For this role you will need to be adaptable, challenge motivated and thrive on implementing high standard productivity and simplicity using Kaizen/PDCA methods. Curiosity and the confidence to take calculated risks quickly are core characteristics for Continuous Improvements Managers.

At Broadcom’s ValueOps division in Prague, Czech Republic, we’re building Rally, the class-leading agile management software recognized 5 years running in Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for Enterprise Agile Planning Tools.
We think that radically transforming the way software is built and delivered is pretty exciting, and we’re looking for a quality assurance engineer who wants to join the fun.

Description:
This is an exciting opportunity for a software engineer passionate about open source software, Linux, and building technology for democratization of Data Centers. Help us build the #1 bare metal cloud system, and work with the best and brightest people in technology at Canonical!
The Ubuntu MAAS team is responsible for delivering our Metal As A Service hyperscale provisioning technology. Ubuntu strives to be the most scalable, cloud ready server distribution and MAAS is our platform to get it there. MAAS is a rapidly evolving software stack written in Python and Go, and we are looking for experienced software engineers who understand performance at scale, networking, storage and usability.
Applicants should be passionate about the future of Ubuntu and be able to show technical leadership with a globally distributed team of engineers who share that passion. This position requires international travel several times a year.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
The future is what we make it.
When you join Honeywell, you become a member of our global team of thinkers, innovators, dreamers and doers who make the things that make the future. That means changing the way we fly, fueling jets in an eco-friendly way, keeping buildings smart and safe and even making it possible to breathe on Mars.

Working at Honeywell isn’t just about developing cool things. That’s why all our employees enjoy access to multifaceted career opportunities acrossdifferent fields and industries.

Are you ready to help us make the future?

We are currently looking for an Application Engineer to join our Aerospace team in Brno. This position will consist of Oracle database analysis, data model development and maintenance, custom coding and developing scripts to automate system related processes. It will also involve development and support of integration projects between xDM and other corporate databases.

Tasks

Key Responsibilities

problems in current applications & databases, ideas for improvement, and changes to be made.
Requirements

We Value

Benefits

If this is your dream role, then we'd love to hear from you.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on age, sex, disability, ethnic or racial origin, religion or belief, or sexual orientation.

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform crucial job functions and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.

Job_title: QA Engineer for a cybersecurity product
Description:
We protect data while respecting the work of users so that you do not complicate their work and they are safe. Become a part of our extraordinary quest for a safer world!

We're looking for a junior QA Engineer to join our new Classification team led by Jakub Neruda. We need someone to help us improve our DLP by enabling full cross-endpoint security.
In doing so, you could be working with C# and Azure DevOps, optimizing and improving our testing process to make it as smooth and reliable as possible, or bringing a fresh perspective on the software development process as a whole.
We work in an agile environment, and our team consists of a team leader, scrum master, developers, and us, QA engineers, who cover their backs. In full cooperation, we enjoy the challenge of constant improvement, and we learn from each other.

Description:
In Thermo Fisher Scientific Brno, we develop and produce high-tech electron microscopes and spectrometers. Our devices are involved in research of SARS-CoV-2 virus or enable mobile phones to get smaller. Our work contributes to making the world healthier, cleaner and safer. We are the biggest production site of electron microscopes worldwide, following a tradition over 70 years long. There are many experts in physics, electronics, software, mechanical engineering and logistics among us.
What are we focused on:
The application software team in Brno is responsible for the development of automation/application software for Transmission Electron Microscopes (TEM). We wok on an automated TEM imaging system using automation. This innovative solution removes the barriers to automation by enabling semiconductor labs to automatically acquire and measure critical dimensions on semiconductor devices during development or in support of manufacturing. Our applications have been primarily developed in C#.Net with WPF as UI on Windows platform by distributed scrum teams. In addition to .Net, Machine Learning part has been mostly written in Python.

Description:
We are looking for an experienced hunter or huntress who love playing games, hunting bugs and search for scripting challenges in QA area. You will cooperate on daily bases with our programmers, scripters, and feel the passion of game development.

Analyze crashes & bugs appearance, cause and/or relation in general during the lifespan of project (handling crashes reported from various sources, reproducing and reporting, cooperation with other departments in order to evaluate priority and providing relevant data serving to fix/improve/verify such issues).
Maintenance and creation of autotests (using a scripting language similar to C#).
Specific case testing (regression tests, bug hunts, continuous testing, testing of playable content and features, reporting issues, providing feedback and end-user opinion in every step of feature development).

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.
